import React from 'react'; import styles from './Company.module.css'; const caseStudies = [ { title: 'Fintech Startup Scales Securely with AWS & CreatixHub', challenge: 'A rapidly growing fintech startup needed to migrate from a monolithic architecture to a scalable and secure cloud infrastructure to handle a 10x increase in user traffic and comply with strict financial regulations.', solution: 'CreatixHub designed and implemented a multi-account AWS strategy, utilizing Kubernetes for container orchestration, and implementing a full CI/CD pipeline. We also integrated a robust security framework with real-time threat detection.', result: 'Achieved 99.99% uptime, reduced infrastructure costs by 30%, and passed all security audits, enabling the client to secure Series B funding.' }, { title: 'E-commerce Giant Boosts Conversion with Custom Recommendation Engine', challenge: 'A major e-commerce player was struggling with low user engagement and a high cart abandonment rate. Their generic product recommendations were failing to connect with customers.', solution: 'Our AI & Data Analytics team developed a custom machine learning model that provided personalized product recommendations in real-time. The solution was integrated seamlessly into their existing platform.', result: 'Increased average order value by 15%, boosted conversion rates by 22%, and improved customer retention by 25%.' } ]; const careers = [ { title: 'Senior Cloud Engineer (AWS/Azure)', location: 'Indore, MP (Hybrid)', description: 'We are looking for an experienced Cloud Engineer to design, implement, and maintain our clients\' cloud infrastructures. The ideal candidate will have deep expertise in AWS or Azure, Infrastructure as Code (Terraform), and containerization (Docker, Kubernetes).' }, { title: 'React Native Developer', location: 'Remote', description: 'Join our mobile development team to build cutting-edge cross-platform applications for our diverse clients. You should have a strong portfolio of React Native apps and a passion for creating intuitive user experiences.' } ]; const blogPosts = [ { title: 'The Future of IT: Top 5 Trends to Watch in 2024', date: 'January 15, 2024', excerpt: 'From Generative AI to the rise of platform engineering, the IT landscape is evolving at an unprecedented pace. In this post, we break down the top 5 trends your business needs to be aware of to stay ahead of the curve...' } ]; export default function Company() { return (

About Us

Founded on the principle of innovation, CreatixHub is a premier IT services company dedicated to helping businesses navigate the complexities of the digital world. We are a team of passionate technologists, strategists, and creative thinkers who believe in the power of technology to solve complex business challenges. Our mission is to be a trusted partner for our clients, providing them with the tools and expertise they need to achieve their goals.

Case Studies

{caseStudies.map((study, index) => (

{study.title}

Challenge: {study.challenge}

Solution: {study.solution}

Result: {study.result}

))}

Careers

We're always on the lookout for talented individuals to join our team. At CreatixHub, you'll have the opportunity to work on challenging projects, grow your skills, and make a real impact. If you're passionate about technology and innovation, we'd love to hear from you.

{careers.map((job, index) => (

{job.title}

Location: {job.location}

{job.description}

Apply Now
))}

Blog

{blogPosts.map((post, index) => (

{post.title}

{post.date}

{post.excerpt}

Read More
))}

Our Partners

We are proud to partner with industry leaders to deliver the best possible solutions to our clients.

AWS Microsoft Azure Google Cloud HashiCorp Datadog
); }
